main event: Multiple witnesses, including an observer and several elderly neighbors, reported seeing a round object with lights that appeared to hover, circle, and climb rapidly out of sight over Bossier City, Louisiana on 8 April 1966.
interesting points: The observer first noticed the object after being pointed out by an elderly neighbor., The object was described as a round shape and the size of a small house., The object exhibited maneuvers such as hovering and rapid climbing to a high altitude., The observer used 10 x 50 binoculars for a closer look at the object., The conclusion of the report suggested it was a reflection of ground lights.
